p: The Lepechinia paniculata EOs of flowers showed quite remarkable inhibitory activity against both the enzymes AChE (IC 50 = 28.2 ± 1.8 µg/mL) and BuChE (IC 50 = 28.8 ± 1.5 µg/mL). By contrast, the EO from the leaves showed a moderate mean inhibitory concentration against AChE (IC 50 = 38.2 ± 2.9 µg/mL) and against BuChE (IC 50 = 47.4 ± 2.3 µg/mL).
